text: Last week i booked to dry-clean my curtains with Astoria. Prompt response on customer service. Pickup and delivery were on time and the team is very professional. My curtains came out smelling fresh and clean like new. Thank you It highly recommended for hassle-free¬†dry¬†cleaning.
Amazing service by Astoria. Fast pickup and quick turnover time. Excellent cleaning too! Sent my hoodie which was stained and returned in perfect condition. Highly recommend them.

Completely unacceptable and unprofessional!

Delivery was randomly scheduled for a Sat morning without my confirmation. The courier was ringing constantly at my door for 10mins, depriving my family of much-needed rest on a weekend. Furthermore, my explicit request to change delivery times was blatantly ignored by Astoria HQ staff, whose replies were slow and sloppy.

The standard industry practice is to CONFIRM delivery timeslot first rather than assuming that the customer accepts, esp for expensive items like clothes sent for dry cleaning. What if me or my family members were not around at that time? This is the last time I'm using Astoria. Disappointing!

Brought our winter clothes to dry clean on Tuesday, was told we could come pick up (we chose self pick-up) on Saturday so we thought cool, relatively fast. But one of the winter clothes was actually a two-piece, and we realised after collection on Saturday that the inner piece was not returned to us. Will provide an update on how it goes tomorrow; if we‚Äôre able to get the inner piece back.

Update: we did manage to get the second piece back üëç

Pleasant overall dry cleaning services for my 2 down winter jackets - Canada goose.
Service includes pick up and delivery and reasonable rates for down jackets dry cleaning.
Customer service accommodating and follow up through with what‚Äôs app.
